column1: #Text=Polycrystalline SCFO was prepared by a solid-state reaction under high-pressure and high-temperature conditions.
#Text=The highly pure (>99.9 %) reactants SrO, Fe2O3, CrO2, and CrO3 were mixed at a ratio of 8:2:3:1.
#Text=The finely mixed reactants were treated at 6 GPa and 1173 K for 30 min on a cubic anvil-type high-pressure apparatus.
